version_description:
This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. According to the caravan, the long-lost Santopany Island has been found out at sea! Us fellow human beings will set foot on this island and explore the ocean again once again.
2. The Commerce Bureau has increased the level cap of people's Manors to Lv.12 and the three Mastery Levels to Lv.60.
3. Buzz... The Camp can finally enter the Electric Period.
4. March 28 – April 10，the April Fool's Day Party is on
Bug fixes and optimizations.

Dear Survivors:
This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors. We are happy to announce that the English version is officially launched. Thank you for your support!
Bug fixes and optimizations.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. According to the caravan, the long-lost Santopany Island has been found out at sea! Us fellow human beings will set foot on this island and explore the ocean again once again.
2. The Commerce Bureau has increased the level cap of people's Manors to Lv.12 and the three Mastery Levels to Lv.60.
3. Buzz... The Camp can finally enter the Electric Period.
4. March 28 – April 10，the April Fool's Day Party is on

Survivors, LifeAfter new release - 'Levin City' is now coming. Dangerous new scenes, evolving infected, secret of hosts that lies deep in the city... The battle will be enormously challenging. Back to where it all started and fight!

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. New outfit——Loving Exercise is available!
2. Commerce Bureau members are allowed to use the new schedule system to complete various tasks to obtain Duty Points.
3. You can pay a Service Charge to book a Manor Party now!
4. Thunderstorms occur from time to time in the Fall forest.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. A new Western Courtyard building has been added. The Courtyard Components can be exchanged/purchased in the Training Store or at the Exchange.
2. New Privileges available for Federation members.
3. Many new screen styles added. Survivors can select their favorite one in the display settings.
4. Infected's behavior and actions have been improved.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. New Outfit – Glorious Moment available! Purchase to get a special bonus exclusive action.
2. New challenge for the the Doomsday comes. 'Third Church University' which once became the restricted zone sent a weak signal recently...
3. A Master can now be promoted to an Expert when all three Mastery Levels reach Lv.60. This will give you greater Profession Talent abilities.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. When a caravan was searching for resources, a western town appeared on the horizon.
2. Formula+ Research will become available after your Crafting Level reaches Lv.15.
3. Ultimate fusion has been added to Formula R&D.
4. Infiltration will begin at the weekend. You will enter a scenario to search for resource packs while disguised as an Infected.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. New Outfit – Steam Power available!
2. The Caravan has a large number of rare goods that need to be delivered.
3. You can go to the Weapon Shop and Armor Shop to forge Accessories and equip them on the corresponding equipment to improve their attributes.
4. New Security Lock feature available in Settings.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. When a caravan was searching for resources, a western town appeared on the horizon.
2. Formula+ Research will become available after your Crafting Level reaches Lv.15.
3. Ultimate fusion has been added to Formula R&D.
4. Infiltration will begin at the weekend. You will enter a scenario to search for resource packs while disguised as an Infected.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. New Outfit – Glorious Moment available! Purchase to get a special bonus exclusive action.
2. New challenge for the the Doomsday comes. 'Third Church University' which once became the restricted zone sent a weak signal recently...
3. A Master can now be promoted to an Expert when all three Mastery Levels reach Lv.60. This will give you greater Profession Talent abilities.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. A new Western Courtyard building has been added. The Courtyard Components can be exchanged/purchased in the Training Store or at the Exchange.
2. New Privileges available for Federation members.
3. Many new screen styles added. Survivors can select their favorite one in the display settings.
4. Infected's behavior and actions have been improved.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. New outfit——Loving Exercise is available!
2. Commerce Bureau members are allowed to use the new schedule system to complete various tasks to obtain Duty Points.
3. You can pay a Service Charge to book a Manor Party now!
4. Thunderstorms occur from time to time in the Fall forest.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. A new crisis is coming, a battle that no one can avoid. Walk down the path of uncertainty, together!
2. New outfit——Showdown is available！

Survivors, LifeAfter new release - 'Levin City' is now coming. Dangerous new scenes, evolving infected, secret of hosts that lies deep in the city... The battle will be enormously challenging. Back to where it all started and fight!

Survivors, LifeAfter new release - 'Levin City' is now coming. Dangerous new scenes, evolving infected, secret of hosts that lies deep in the city... The battle will be enormously challenging. Back to where it all started and fight!

Survivors, LifeAfter new release - 'Levin City' is now coming. Dangerous new scenes, evolving infected, secret of hosts that lies deep in the city... The battle will be enormously challenging. Back to where it all started and fight!

Survivors, LifeAfter new release - 'Levin City' is now coming. Dangerous new scenes, evolving infected, secret of hosts that lies deep in the city... The battle will be enormously challenging. Back to where it all started and fight!

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
'Humanity Restoration Plan' is coming. Repair Railroad to go to the New Levin suburb area, build your New Cohabitation Manor with your roommate, ride a Motorcycle to break out from the enemy, and don't forget to check out your Revolver and Shield.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. Brand new outfit - Youth Gusto has arrived in the Mall.
2. Survivors can customize Camp Contests to suit their preferences in Nancy Contest, Quiz and Race.
3. Mystic Creature Strikes Back! The Mystic Creature will respawn on the same map 7 minutes after it's defeated. Stay vigilant, Survivors .

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
Earthquakes, abnormal temperature rises, food and resource shortages, and a new type of Infected have emerged all across the land. The Commerce Bureau and Scientia have both launched an investigation into these strange phenomena. You can help Scientia experts search for evidence, or assist the Commerce Bureau team leader in wiping out the new Infected... No one knows what will happen next, but every person needs to make a decision. The decisions you make will shape the future.

LifeAfter x Resident Evil™ Joint Event is Online.
Players are facing scarce resources, harsh weather, and dangerous wild lives, and from scratch collect resources, buildhouses,make tool sand weapons, and fight alongside with teammates to make and defend a home in a post-apocalyptic world.

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. Brand new outfit "Homerunner" is now available for purchase in the Mall.
2. Improved the material tracking feature. Now it's possible to quickly track and calculate the amount of materials you need to craft an item.
3. Affected by the hurricane, Santopany will experience sustained typhoons and rainfalls, with hurricane landfalls occurring every once in a while.

LifeAfter x Resident Evil™ Joint Event is Online.

LifeAfter Season 3 is coming! Survive, Restart the World!
Season 3 will introduce never-seen-before content to all players, including seamless open world, upgraded zombies, land, air and sea combat, etc., which will massively revolutionize the game's survival experience!

This is Radio 101 transmitting across all AM frequencies, calling all survivors.
1. The Camp welcomes in the brand-new Information Age!
2. Added Camp Custom Red Packet.
3. Thanks to the efforts of the Federation and the Camp Mayor, Hope 101 and Private Camp are attracting more and more city residents. They look really active, so try and talk with them!
4. By consuming Gold Bars, the appearance of a backpack pendant can be changed through Pendant Imitation.

LifeAfter x GHOST IN THE SHELL: SAC_2045 crossover Official launched!
Players are facing scarce resources, harsh weather, and dangerous wild lives, and from scratch collect resources, buildhouses,make tool sand weapons, and fight alongside with teammates to make and defend a home in a post-apocalyptic world.
